genesis.getYourGenesisSubs: For every NFT you buy on the NFTGenesis, you automatically receive a generous 2% share of the marketing revenues generated from subsequent NFT Farm sales. That's right, simply by being an NFTShare investor, you become an active contributor to the growth and promotion of the entire NFT marketplace.
genesis.youDontOwn: You don't own any NFT Genesis
genesis.successMessage: Success! Thank you for your purchase

dao.description: Our mission is to revolutionize real estate ownership. We introduce Fractional Real Estate Ownership through NFTs, making premium real estate accessible to everyone. We use blockchain technology to divide properties into affordable shares represented by NFTs. This means you can invest in high-end real estate with a minimal budget, diversify your portfolio globally, trade with ease, and be part of a transparent and supportive community of investors. We're not just offering investment opportunities; we're fostering financial growth, literacy, and independence. Join us in reshaping the real estate landscape and step into the future of real estate with Global Network DeFi!
dao.detailDaoDescription1: Designed for you to enjoy every new day with its large garden, private pool, olive trees and Tuzla Bird Sanctuary view, Helis Serina Bodrum offers a villa experience in hotel comfort with the services it provides and special privileges. Peace and comfort come together with its special architecture and technological infrastructure that brings the lake view to your home.
dao.detailDaoDescription2: Just 15 km distance to Milas Airport, this villa is in the Helis Serina Bodrum villa project and offers a great stable income in one of the most sought-after locations on the Aegean coast. 35-minutes distance to Bodrum and 1.1 km distance to the sea.
dao.5: Very close distance to Milas airport

Join us in reshaping the real estate landscape and step into the future of real estate with Global Network DeFi!
daoBali.detailDaoDescription1: Hot sales vila in cemagi area near the beach

nftFarming.title: NFT Farming
nftFarming.content: NFT Farming is a unique way to earn tokens in the world of blockchain. When you buy an NFT (Non-Fungible Token) and keep it in your digital wallet, you have the power to claim tokens for yourself from a smart contract. What makes NFT Farming special is that you can also sell or transfer your rights to receive these tokens from the smart contract. This means you have control over your earnings and can choose how to manage them. It's a flexible and exciting way to participate in blockchain projects.

nftGenesis.title: NFT Genesis
nftGenesis.content: Genesis NFTs represent ownership in the GLOBAL NETWORK DEFI platform. When platform users make purchases, a portion of the sales goes into the Genesis NFT Owner Pool. Genesis NFT Owners can claim dividends in realtime via smart contract.

nftProperty.title: PROPERTY NFT
nftProperty.content: We leverage the power of blockchain technology to fractionize real estate properties into smaller, more affordable shares, represented by Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). This means you can own a piece of premium real estate for a fraction of the traditional price, allowing you to step into the real estate market and build your portfolio, regardless of your budget!

shareToEarn.title: SHARE TO Earn
shareToEarn.content: " Share to Earn " is a feature that allows our active community members promote brands online and get paid for it. Our community is super important, and now they can make awesome content, share it on social media, and earn rewards through smart contracts. This helps our partner projects and clients get more attention for their brands, and it gives our community a way to make money by being social media influencers. "Share to Earn" is more than just a feature; it's a team effort to get the word out, recognize influence, and create a future where we all make money together in the digital world.

home.quotes: We will always do the right thing and work together to succeed. By constantly improving ourselves, we aim to achieve even greater things as a community

header.title: No 1 Decentralized Web3 Network Marketing Platform
header.subtitle: The global network aims to revolutionize the network marketing industry by decentralizing millions of users to web3 applications. Every application and utility will be built on top of the decentralized network marketing referral contract, allowing users to receive royalties from referral sales up to 100 levels.

feature.title: FEATURES
feature.subtitle: Global Network Defi aims to revolutionize the world of community marketing by decentralizing millions of users through web3 applications. Every application and utility will be build upon decentralized community marketing referral contract. Get royalty from referral sales up to 100 levels.

fullTransparency.title: Full Transparency
fullTransparency.subtitle: Anyone can view the entire transaction history at any time. This ensures fair conditions and reliable statistics that you can rely on

fullAutomation.title: Full Automation
fullAutomation.subtitle: All transactions take place directly from personal wallet to smart contract. Participants do all transaction directly to smart contract and processing automatically through smart contract

smartContract.title: Smart Contract
smartContract.subtitle: Global Network ecosystem is built around the technology of smart contracts and NFTs, which are completely autonomous and exclude the influence of the human factor.

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.subtitle: All data is stored in the blockchain in the public domain and can be verified!

matchingBonus.title: 100 Level
matchingBonus.subtitle: Matching bonus
matchingBonus.description: Get matching up to 100 levels for any project issued by the decentralized global network marketing team

populationSection.title: Global Decentralized Community Marketing
populationSection.content: Currently only 1% of the 7.96 billion people on Earth own a cryptocurrency wallet, indicating that we are still in the early stages of this market. However, with the widespread ownership of smartphones, there's a growing potential for more people to own crypto wallets and cryptocurrencies. The Global Network Platform offers an opportunity to earn residual income by building a community. All products, including NFT farming, share-to-earn initiatives, royalty properties, crypto cafes, metaverse projects, and more, will be sold through the Global Network DeFi referral contract. Join us to access the world's premier community referral program for everything related to crypto, DeFi, the metaverse, and blockchain, and start earning income
